macronutrients.notes: Values estimated based on standard ingredient data for a single mug cake serving.

ingredients.name: egg (whisked)
ingredients.notes: Do not use a whole egg; 2 tbsp gives the best texture.

ingredients.name: chocolate chips
ingredients.substitutions: Can use broken candy bar pieces instead.

instructions.title: Prepare tools and ingredients
instructions.description: Gather a large microwave-safe mug, digital scale, and a microwave. Measure all ingredients accurately.

instructions.title: Mix ingredients
instructions.description: Add flour, sugar, and cocoa to the mug and mix. Add whisked egg and combine until pasty. Stir in milk and oil. Add chocolate chips and a splash of vanilla. Mix thoroughly.

instructions.title: Microwave
instructions.description: Cook for 3 minutes in a 1000W microwave or 4 minutes in a 700W microwave. The cake will rise above the mug but settle after cooking.

instructions.title: Customize and experiment
instructions.description: Adjust microwave time, egg, or flour amounts for different textures. Keep notes on what works best with your microwave. For a fudgier version, omit the egg.
